channel.title: CVE Feed for Corel -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Corel -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-2803|2024-09-17T02:16:09.324Z -- corel -- photo-paint
item.description: A remote out of bound write vulnerability exists in the TIFF parsing functionality of Core PHOTO-PAINT X8 version 18.1.0.661. A specially crafted TIFF file can cause a vulnerability resulting in potential memory corruption. An attacker can send the victim a specific TIFF file to trigger this vulnerability. This vulnerability only exists in the 64-bit version.
